member.name: T:pelda_dokumentacio.DocExample
member.summary: A sample class for documentation generation

member.name: M:pelda_dokumentacio.DocExample.AddAndRound(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Add two numbers and round the result to 4 digits
member.returns: sum of n1 and n2 rounded to 4 digits

member.name: M:pelda_dokumentacio.DocExample.MultipyAndRound(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Multiplies two numbers and round the result to 4 digits
member.returns: multiple of n1 and n2 rounded to 4 digits
